alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:28AM CDT until July 23 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR JO DAVIESS...NORTHWESTERN CARROLL AND EASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 328 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blanding Landing, or 9 miles south of Galena, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Galena, Savanna, Bellevue, Stockton, Warren, Hanover, Elizabeth, Woodbine, Sabula, Scales Mound, Menominee, Springbrook, Schapville, Massbach, Green Island, Van Buren, Guilford, Rice, Whitton and North Hanover. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
